pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gaussian Processes for Estimating Causal Exposure Response Curves // Provides a non-parametric Bayesian framework based on Gaussian process priors for estimating causal effects of a continuous exposure and detecting change points in the causal exposure response curves using observational data. Ren, B., Wu, X., Braun, D., Pillai, N., Dominici, F.(2021). "Bayesian modeling for exposure response curve via gaussian processes: Causal effects of exposure to air pollution on health outcomes." arXiv preprint arXiv:2105.03454.
